title: Grand Slam
content:
Targets still take half damage.

The target can't be pushed if it is Large or Huge in size.

3m DEX Save Short Rest

Grand Slam is a Weapon Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Grand Slam allows you to slam your weapon into the ground and push away nearby enemies. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
